member.summary: The OAuth client settings.

member.summary: Gets or sets the client identifier.

member.summary: Gets or sets the client secret.

member.summary: Gets or sets the realm.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.OAuth2ClientSettings.AppName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the application.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.OAuth2ClientSettings.ScopeSeparator
member.summary: Gets or sets the scope separator.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.OAuth2ClientSettings.Scopes
member.summary: Gets or sets initially selected scopes.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.OAuth2ClientSettings.AdditionalQueryStringParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional query string parameters.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.OAuth2ClientSettings.UsePkceWithAuthorizationCodeGrant
member.summary: Proof Key for Code Exchange. Only applies to `accessCode` flow. Supported in SwaggerUI 3.

member.summary: The settings for UseReDoc.

member.name: T:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerSettings`1
member.summary: The settings for UseSwagger.

member.name: M:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerSettings`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerSettings`1.GeneratorSettings
member.summary: Gets the generator settings.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerSettings`1.MiddlewareBasePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the OWIN base path (when mapped via app.MapOwinPath()) (must start with '/').

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerSettings`1.DocumentPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger document route (must start with '/', default: '/swagger/v1/swagger.json').

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerSettings`1.PostProcess
member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger post process action.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerSettings`1.ExceptionCacheTime
member.summary: Gets or sets for how long a caught during schema generation is cached.

member.name: T:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1
member.summary: The settings for UseSwaggerUi3.

member.name: M:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1.OAuth2Client
member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger UI OAuth2 client settings.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1.ServerUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the server URL.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1.EnableTryItOut
member.summary: Specifies whether the "Try it out" option is enabled in Swagger UI 3.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1.DocumentTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets a title for the Swagger UI page.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1.CustomHeadContent
member.summary: Gets or sets additional content to place in the head of the Swagger UI page.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1.ValidateSpecification
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Swagger specification should be validated.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1.AdditionalSettings
member.summary: Gets the additional Swagger UI 3 settings.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1.DocExpansion
member.summary: Controls how the API listing is displayed. It can be set to 'none' (default), 'list' (shows operations for each resource), or 'full' (fully expanded: shows operations and their details).

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1.OperationsSorter
member.summary: Specifies the operations sorter in Swagger UI 3.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1.DefaultModelsExpandDepth
member.summary: The default expansion depth for models (set to -1 completely hide the models) in Swagger UI 3.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1.DefaultModelExpandDepth
member.summary: The default expansion depth for the model on the model-example section in Swagger UI 3.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1.TagsSorter
member.summary: Specifies the tags sorter in Swagger UI 3

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1.PersistAuthorization
member.summary: Specifies whether to persist authorization data in Swagger UI 3.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1.WithCredentials
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to send credentials from the Swagger UI 3 to the backend.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Settings`1.SwaggerRoutes
member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger URL routes (must start with '/', hides SwaggerRoute).

member.name: T:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Route
member.summary: Specifies a route in the Swagger dropdown.

member.name: M:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Route.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Route.Url
member.summary: Gets the route URL.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUi3Route.Name
member.summary: Gets the route name.

member.name: T:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettings`1
member.summary: The settings for UseSwaggerUi.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettings`1.ValidateSpecification
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Swagger specification should be validated.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettings`1.OAuth2Client
member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger UI OAuth2 client settings.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettings`1.SupportedSubmitMethods
member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger UI supported submit methods. An array of of the HTTP operations that will have the 'Try it out!' option.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettings`1.DocExpansion
member.summary: Controls how the API listing is displayed. It can be set to 'none' (default), 'list' (shows operations for each resource), or 'full' (fully expanded: shows operations and their details).

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettings`1.UseJsonEditor
member.summary: Enables a graphical view for editing complex bodies. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettings`1.DefaultModelRendering
member.summary: Controls how models are shown when the API is first rendered. (The user can always switch the rendering for a given model by clicking the 'Model' and 'Model Schema' links.) It can be set to 'model' or 'schema', and the default is 'schema'.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettings`1.ShowRequestHeaders
member.summary: Whether or not to show the headers that were sent when making a request via the 'Try it out!' option. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettingsBase`1
member.summary: The base settings for all Swagger UIs.

member.name: M:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettingsBase`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettingsBase`1.Path
member.summary: Gets or sets the internal swagger UI route (must start with '/').

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettingsBase`1.CustomInlineStyles
member.summary: Gets or sets custom inline styling to inject into the index.html

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettingsBase`1.CustomStylesheetPath
member.summary: Gets or sets a URI to load a custom CSS Stylesheet into the index.html

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettingsBase`1.CustomJavaScriptPath
member.summary: Gets or sets a URI to load a custom JavaScript file into the index.html.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettingsBase`1.UseModuleTypeForCustomJavaScript
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag that indicates to use or not type="module" in a custom script tag (default: false).

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettingsBase`1.TransformToExternalPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the external route base path (must start with '/', default: null = use SwaggerUiRoute).

member.name: M:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettingsBase`1.GetCustomStyleHtml(Microsoft.Owin.IOwinRequest)
member.summary: Gets an HTML snippet for including custom StyleSheet in swagger UI.

member.name: M:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettingsBase`1.GetCustomScriptHtml(Microsoft.Owin.IOwinRequest)
member.summary: Gets an HTML snippet for including custom JavaScript in swagger UI.

member.name: M:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiSettingsBase`1.GenerateAdditionalSettings(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Generates the additional objects JavaScript code.
